item.title: How to block Log4j with fail2ban
item.author: Author
item.description: So today, we will see how to detect and immediately ban using fail2ban, all the creeps that try to exploit your servers with log4j. First things first If you haven’t done so yet, check out here the official CISA log4j vulnerability guidance, which includes all the responses from a bunch of software vendors. The problem The problem with the internet is that too many computers, in my opinion, have for the sole purpose to scan and detect all accessible and vulnerable servers.
